titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Rush Rhees, [6. 10. 1938]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Ã–NB (Autogr. 1286/15-6); Kopie im BA. Publiziert (WiC, S. 295).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I'm in bed with a 'flu. I'm looking forward to seeing you! The University Press has accepted my book.
Thanks for your letter. I see your point; but I still think you might have tried. Anyway I hope to see you soon
